meaningMnemonic: The <radical>alcohol</radical> that needs <radical>measurement</radical> is <kanji>hard liquor</kanji>. Drinking too much hard liquor isn't good for you, so you must make sure to measure it out in precise quantities.
readingMnemonic: You know who enjoyed <kanji>hard liquor</kanji> a lot? <reading>Chew</reading>bacca (ちゅう). He was always drinking, which is concerning when you think about all the driving he did.
